A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not sure what movie the critics saw.  The film I saw was horrible in so many ways.  From the Princess Leia Marry Poppins moment in the vacuum of space\, to the handling of Luke's character\, in which everything he did was WRONG. The NEW characters have no chemistry and no depth.  There were so many things wrong with this film and the story.  A group of 8th graders could of come up with a better story line\, and one that made more sense.  DON'T LISTEN TO THE CRITICS\, this movie sucks.  I give half a star for the CGI Special Effects\, beyond that there is nothing redeeming with this film.  Good bye Star Wars.
